languages.text: "Вот бедняга... А как убедительно врал! Я аж поверил, что он и вправду колдун".
"That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."
languages.original_text: "Вот бедняга... А как убедительно врал! Я аж поверил, что он и вправду колдун".

traits.locale_text: "Poor fellow... He should have become an actor with such talents. I thought he was really a sorcerer!"
"Poor fellow... He should have become an actor with such talents. I thought he was really a sorcerer!"
"That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."
"Poor fellow... He should have become an actor with such talents. I thought he was really a sorcerer!"
"Poor fellow... He should have become an actor with such talents. I thought he was really a sorcerer!"
"That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."
"That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."
"That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."
"That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."

languages.text: Der arme Bursche ... Er hat mich reingelegt! Ich dachte, er wäre wirklich ein Zauberer.
languages.original_text: "That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."

traits.locale_text: Der arme Bursche ... Er hat mich reingelegt! Ich dachte, er wäre wirklich ein Zauberer.
"Armer Kerl ... Mit diesen Talenten hätte er Schauspieler werden sollen. Ich dachte, er wäre wirklich ein Zauberer!"

languages.text: « Pauvre diable... Je me suis bien fait avoir ! J'ai vraiment cru que c'était un sorcier. »
languages.original_text: "That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."

traits.locale_text: « Pauvre diable... Je me suis bien fait avoir ! J'ai vraiment cru que c'était un sorcier. »
« Pauvre diable... Avec de tels talents, il aurait dû devenir comédien. J'ai vraiment cru que c'était un sorcier ! »

languages.text: «Pobre diablo... ¡Me han engañado! De verdad que creía que era un hechicero».
languages.original_text: "That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."

traits.locale_text: «Pobre diablo... ¡Me han engañado! De verdad que creía que era un hechicero».
«Pobre diablo... Con esos talentos, tendría que haber sido actor. ¡De verdad creía que era un hechicero!».

languages.text: 「可哀想なやつめ…。私を騙しやがって！彼が本物のソーサラーかと思ったよ」
languages.original_text: "That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."

traits.locale_text: 「可哀想なやつめ…。私を騙しやがって！彼が本物のソーサラーかと思ったよ」
「哀れな奴だ…これだけの才能があったのなら、俳優になるべきだったな。本物のソーサラーだと思ってたんだ」

languages.text: “那个可怜的家伙……我真的被他骗到了！我刚刚还真以为他真是个巫师呢！”
languages.original_text: "That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."

traits.locale_text: “那个可怜的家伙……我真的被他骗到了！我刚刚还真以为他真是个巫师呢！”
“这家伙真可怜……他这么有天赋，应该去当演员才对。我刚刚还以为他真是个巫师呢！”

languages.text: "Zavallı adam... Beni nasıl da kandırdı! Gerçekten de sahir olduğunu sanmıştım."
languages.original_text: "That poor fellow... He sure fooled me! I thought he was really a sorcerer."
